tool.name: mzml-to-msp
tool.description: Extract MS2 spectra from and convert a (set of) mzML file(s) to MSP format.

param.name: polarity
param.label: polarity
param.help: The polarity used for the mode of acquisition

param.name: mzabs
param.label: absolute mass error
param.help: Absolute mass error (in seconds) used for merging MS/MS spectra

param.name: mzppm
param.label: ppm error
param.help: ppm error used for merging MS/MS spectra

param.name: rtabs
param.label: retention time error
param.help: Retention time error (in seconds) used for merging MS/MS spectra

param.name: maxrtrange
param.label: retention time range
param.help: Permitted retention time window (in seconds) of grouped MS1 precursors

param.name: maxmzrange
param.label: m/z range
param.help: Permitted m/z window of grouped MS1 precursors

param.name: minrt
param.label: minimum retention time
param.help: Minimum retention time for selected precursors

param.name: maxrt
param.label: maximum retention time
param.help: Maximum retention time for selected precursors

param.name: minmz
param.label: minimum m/z
param.help: Minimum m/z value for selected precursors

param.name: maxmz
param.label: maximum m/z
param.help: Maximum m/z value for selected precursors

param.name: msmsintensitythreshold
param.label: intensity cut-off
param.help: Minimum intensity value for MS/MS peaks

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Authors**
| **Kristian Peters (kpeters@ipb-halle.de)** wrote and maintains this module.
---------------------------------------------------
=========== mzML to MSP ===========
----------- Description -----------
| Extract spectra from and convert mzML file to MSP format.
----------- Input files -----------
+------------------------------+------------+ | File | Format | +==============================+============+ | 1) mzML file(s) | mzML | +------------------------------+------------+
---------- Parameters ----------
polarity | The polarity used for the mode of acquisition |
absolute mass error | Absolute mass error (in seconds) used for merging MS/MS spectra |
ppm error | ppm error used for merging MS/MS spectra |
retention time error | Retention time error (in seconds) used for merging MS/MS spectra |
retention time range | Permitted retention time window (in seconds) of grouped MS1 precursors |
m/z range | Permitted m/z window of grouped MS1 precursors |
minimum retention time | Minimum retention time for selected precursors |
maximum retention time | Maximum retention time for selected precursors |
minimum m/z | Minimum m/z value for selected precursors |
maximum m/z | Maximum m/z value for selected precursors |
intensity cut-off | Minimum intensity value for MS/MS peaks |
------------ Output files ------------
xcmssplit_input_1.rdata | (Multiple) rdata file(s) containing one XCMS-Set object each |
---------------------------------------------------
